title: Detailing Services
desp: Complete exterior washing service with professional attention to detail. Available for all vehicle types including hatchbacks, sedans, and SUVs.

title: Paint Protection
desp: Premium Protektor Made in Canada paint protection film with 10 years warranty, including lifetime material and yearly top-up service.

title: Vehicle Customization
desp: Professional vehicle wrapping service with multiple warranty options for complete vehicle transformation.

title: Repair Services
desp: Professional paintless dent repair service to remove dents without affecting the original paint finish.
